amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-786 to provide voting representation for Rhode Island on the Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council (MAFMC).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Langevin.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by voice vote.
